name: Not a Fishing Simulator
description:
Description:

Ermes loves fishing. This time he decided to go big, expecting unique catch in the great ocean. Unfortunately he became the target of man-eating shark. Now he needs to... race for his life!

Goal:

Run away from the shark and don't fall into deeper ocean.

Controls:

move forward - right

move backwards - left

jump - up

use first item - z

use second item - x

use third item - c

Items:

fish - reduces shark's speed

knife - cuts three nearest seaweed

boost - boosts player's speed

mushroom - gives player 100 points

trash - thrown away takes 5 points

Finishing level with any item in equipment gives 10 point for each item.

Obstacles:

shark - kills player

seaweed - reduces player's speed

hole - kills player

rock - blocks player's way
